sentences.en: A large quantities of pathogenic organisms were found in sewage sludge.
sentences.cn: 污泥污水中集聚了大量病原体.

sentences.en: Animals frequently carry pathogenic organisms, which cause foodborne disease.
sentences.cn: 动物常携带致病性微生物, 可导致食源性疾病.

sentences.en: Conclusion: The contamination of entering - ship potable waters were severely by pathogenic Vibrio.
sentences.cn: 结论: 入境船舶上的饮用水被致病性弧菌污染较严重.

sentences.en: Despite the prevalence of H. capsulatum and its threat to human health, we have a limited understanding of the transcriptional regulatory network that governs pathogenic yeast-phase growth.
sentences.cn: 尽管荚膜的患病率及其对人体健康的威胁，我们有一个有限的转录调控网络的认识，管理致病酵母相生长。
致病的似酵母的真菌的属。

sentences.en: Highly pathogenic avian influenza often is fatal in poultry and the H5N1 strain of the disease is spreading rapidly in some parts of the world.
sentences.cn: 高致病性禽流感对家禽来说常常是一种致命的疾病，这种疾病的H5N1病毒正在世界上某些国家迅速传播。

sentences.en: However, spices also can contain pathogenic and spoilage organisms.
sentences.cn: 然而, 调味料也含有病原菌和变质菌类.

sentences.en: Man is host to a variety of pathogenic bacteria , protozoa, and viruses.
sentences.cn: 人是各种致疾的细菌 、 原生动物以及病毒的宿主.

sentences.en: Many of the pathogenic organisms may be encased in the particles.
sentences.cn: 许多致病生物体可能被粒子所包围.

sentences.en: Objective To study the pathogenic factors and epidemiologic features of chronic gastritis and peptic ulcer in children.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨儿童慢性胃炎、消化性溃疡的致病因素及流行病学特点。

sentences.en: Objective To understand the contamination status of pathogenic Vibrio in aquatic products.
sentences.cn: 目的了解水产品中致病性弧菌污染状况.

sentences.en: Pathogenic factors are chemical contamination, microbial contamination, poisonous animal and plant contamination.
sentences.cn: 致病因素依次为化学性污染 、 微生物污染 、 有毒动植物污染和不明原因污染.

sentences.en: Pathogenic factors of cough with dyspnea disease in senility involve two aspects.
sentences.cn: 探讨老年性咳喘症的辨证及治疗规律.

sentences.en: Results: 1. The pathogenic age segments in theoccurace of HCH: from 50 - 69 yearsold ( 70±2.3 ).
sentences.cn: 结果: 1、高血压性脑出血频发年龄集中在40岁-79岁之间, 共372例 ( 93±1.3),发病高峰年龄段是: 50岁 - 69岁(70±2.3 ).

sentences.en: The pathogenic fungi of pear canker disease is a new variety.
sentences.cn: 梨树腐烂病病原菌为一新变种.

sentences.en: The tabtoxin is an pathogenic factor for the worldwide - occurred tobacco wildfire disease.
sentences.cn: 烟草野火病是一种世界普遍发生的病害.

sentences.en: They are not pathogenic factors; they are five comprehensive changes of pathogenesis.
sentences.cn: 它们不是病理因素, 而是五种综合的病理改变.

sentences.en: They can occur as spoilage organisms and some are pathogenic causing infections.
sentences.cn: 作为腐生菌,它可能损害生物机体并具有一定致病性和传染性.

sentences.en: To research the pathogenic microorganism characters of chronic pharyngitis.
sentences.cn: 目的:研究慢性咽炎的病原学问题.

words.tran_cn: [病理][医][基医]致病的；病原的；发病的（等于pathogenetic）

phrases.tran_cn: 病原微生物；致病微生物

trans.tran_en: A pathogenic organism can cause disease in a person, animal, or plant
